channel.title: Posts on Russian Trolls
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Russian Trolls

item.title: Daily Tweets
item.description: Throughout the 2016 US Presidential Election, Tweets were published by trolls associated with the Internet Research Agency (IRA) - a Russian entity. The IRA is believed to have been tasked with interfering in the 2016 US Presidential Election with their primary goal being to disseminate news and opinions in a way that motivated the spread of disinformation in a critical time in US politics. In 2016, the two primary candidates up for the US Presidency were Donald J.

item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: # # Adding an image of the trump file knitr::include_graphics("/post/trump.png") /* Ensuring that the image above dynamically fits the users screen using css. */ img { width: 100%; height: auto; } /* Ensuring that the image above dynamically fits the users screen using css.
